slideOne.title: Discover
slideOne.content: Discover {{orgDisplayName}} Campus and get access to online courses for free

slideTwo.title: Learn
slideTwo.content: You can choose what you want to study: Web Design, Python, Online Business, Psychology, IT skills, English, and many more!

slideThree.title: Connect
slideThree.content: More than 6.000 students around the world are a part of {{orgDisplayName}}. Share your study experience with them.
